unnormalised: Arre bhai, remember to link your PAN card no. to your Aadhaar before 31/03! Also, if you're starting a business, get your GSTIN sorted ASAP; mine is 27AXYZ1234A1Z5.
normalised: Arre bhai, remember to link your P-A-N card number to your Aadhaar before thirty first march! Also, if you're starting a business, get your G-S-T-I-N sorted A-S-A-P; mine is twenty seven A X-Y-Z one two three four A one Z five.
